section.title: The kaarpux/bootstrap directory
section.para: The kaarpux/bootstrap directory is created by kaarpux/master/make_scripts.sh and will contain the files needed to bootstrap &kx; on the host system.

listitem.para: Contains a subdirectory for each bootstrap step: kaarpux/master/build/bootstrap_[1-8]. Each package gets unpacked and build in a sub-sub-directory.
Scripts which are used in the chroot during bootstrap. Copied from kaarpux/master/chroot_scripts by kaarpux/master/make_scripts.sh.
Scripts which are used on the host system during bootstrap. Copied from kaarpux/master/host_scripts by kaarpux/master/make_scripts.sh.

Contains a subdirectory for each bootstrap step: kaarpux/master/log/bootstrap_[1-8]. During bootstrap, each step is logged in a file in this subdirectory. During bootstrap, the special subdirectory kaarpux/master/log/files will be populated with a list of files for each step.
